name: Narthex
generalDescription:
You stand in a dusty, empty, square room, the size of a large 
	walk-in wardrobe. The floor is ice-cold marble caked in inches of fine gray particles. 
	The prints of hundreds or thousands of bare feet criss cross the room. Mysterious piles 
	sit in shadow in each corner of the room. You hear a murmur of soft voices whispering 
	from all directions and impossible to fathom. The walls are tessellated with dirty 
	ceramic tiles. On each tile is inscribed with words. In the center of one of the walls 
	is a freshly painted wooden door with a brass handle.

hotSpot.description:
In this corner is a pile of rusty broadswords, daggers, and axes. 
			But one {{boldRedOn}}small knife{{formatOff}} looks clean and sharp.

item.name: small knife
item.description: A small steel knife, sharp but not worthy of a name.

hotSpot.description:
In this corner is a pile of tarnished brass chain mail. But one 
			coat of tightly {{boldRedOn}}ringed mail{{formatOff}} with leather straps looks new and ready to wear.

item.name: ringed mail
item.description: A coat of tightly ringed brass mail with leather straps, well worn.

hotSpot.description:
In this corner is a pile of dented brass helms. But one {{boldRedOn}}shiny 
			skullcap{{formatOff}} looks like it might fit you.

item.name: shiny skullcap
item.description: A shiny brass skullcap with just a few minor dents and bloodstains.

hotSpot.description:
In this corner is a pile of splintered wooden shields. But one 
			{{boldRedOn}}wooden buckler{{foramtOff}} with brass fittings looks light and sturdy enough to be worth taking.

item.name: wooden buckler
item.description: A light and sturdy wooden buckler with brass fittings.

hotSpot.description:
The tiles on the bulwark before you cover the wall without making a 
			rational pattern. At least not one that you can perceive. It seems the tiles have 
			been scrambled. Printed on each tile is a word. Some are even in a language you 
			understand. The Tiles looks like you can sort them by swaping two tiles at 
           a time. Currently the tiles are in the following order: {{current-tile-squence}}
hotSpot.failDescription: Darn it all to heck! The tiles are not in the correct order: {{current-tile-squence}}.

item.name: green tile
item.description:
A tile with the name of a famous poet on it. It's current position
              on the wall is {{current-position}}
item.failDescription: You can't swap the green tile with with the {{command-target}}.

hotSpot.description:
You stand before a silver door in which you can see your reflection. In the center of the 
        door is a {{boldRedOn}golden knob{{formatOff}. The knob is {{golden-knob-locked-state}}
hotSpot.successDescription: The silver door swings open. You can enter into the next room if you dare.

item.name: golden knob
item.description: A golden knob that is waiting to be turned. The knob is {{golden-knob-locked-state}}
item.failDescription: The golden knob is locked. You can't turn it.
item.successDescription: The golden know is unlocked. You easily turn it.
